content:
If anyone has a bit of time I'd be grateful for feedback on:
#17046 (+103, -0): src(dynamics/ergodic/ergodic): define ergodic maps / measures

All the fiddly supporting lemmas were merged separately so I think it should be a relatively easy review.
:ping_pong:
I left some comments. Please remember to add labels to the PR (I added t-measure-probability in that case), so that it's easier to find among all other PRs.
